content_descriptors.notes:
This Soundtrack doesn't contain NSFW content, but the original game contains adult content including nudity and NSFW content. All characters in the game are adults.

The game contains non-sexual violence (cartoon violence, fights, hypnosis), murders, depiction of criminal acts and positive depiction of criminal behavior, alcohol consumption and smoking, hints of drug use (weed), profanity and swearing.

The game features nude girls, monster girls and animated H-scenes. The game contains adult material and scenes of a sexual nature with various fetishes that some viewers may find offensive: blowjob, titjob, cunnilingus, vaginal, anal, non-penetrative sexual acts, creampie, BDSM. All sex in the game is consensual.
